Posts.Content: gobuster wrote: Found lump myself on Sept. 20th 2009.  Diagnosed with Infiltrating Lobular Cancer ILC on Sept 29th.  Waiting for my menstrual cycle to start to have a MRI between day 6 -10 of my cycle.  Time is not my friend.  Many emotions!  Also waiting to have a second opinion on Oct. 14th. Just bought "Get Felt" sweatshirt to encourage others to check!! Want to see a genetic counselor.  Only paternal grandma had breast cancer.  Otherwise this was out of the blue!!!!  Digesting it all. Mary Dx 9/29/2009, ILC, 3cm, Stage II, Grade 2, 1/9 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: waiting.... gobuster hrf
